body:
- configure update to detect Fujitsu fortran compiler.
- fix fox configure.
fox's configure search -out and -o option to specify Fortran output file.
Fujitsu fortran accept -out option, but the output file cannot execute.
- fix scalapack detection.
When configue --scalapack=yes is specifies, configure append only -lscalapack option to linker.
But fujitsu SSL2 library on a64fx must use -lscalapacksve. So this PR set SCALAPACK_LIBS option.
- fix intent and AND function usage.
title: quantum-expresso: fix for Fujitsu compiler
